headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities Resets Balance Sheet And Dividend As Shares Rebound
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (NYSE:ARE) launched a cash tender offer for up to $800 million of its senior notes. The company reported more than $1.7 billion in real estate impairments in the fourth quarter. The board approved a significant cut to the quarterly dividend to preserve liquidity and adjust capital allocation. For investors watching NYSE:ARE, these moves come at a time when the stock sits at $58.14 and longer term returns have been weak, with a 36.4% decline over the past year...

headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities Inc (ARE) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Leasing ...
summary: Despite a dip in same-property NOI and significant impairments, Alexandria Real Estate Equities Inc (ARE) showcases robust leasing volume and strategic dispositions.

headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. Announces Cash Tender Offers
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc.
